title: Trying to delete a ›has-car-model‹ relationship where both IDs are invalid
gherkin:
Given "BRAND" "Bugati" does NOT exist
And "CAR MODEL" "Veyron" does NOT exist
When the user deletes the "has-car-model" relationship between "Bugati" and "Veyron"
Then the request should be rejected with status code 404
